I only download movies if I've seen them on TV or in the cinema's. Kung Fu Panda 2 is not different from this cause I hate pirating. 

However, Half the movie is not filmed. I watched it in the cinema's in my native language, because well, the English one wasn't showing. I decided to download it in the English one and saw half the movie is off-screen. You'll miss half the movie watching this. 

NOT WORTH DOWNLOADING!!!!

I'm sorry that I'm not English. With off-screen I mean only part of the screen has been filmed. So what you see is only part of the movie screen. Like literally half of the screen. You'll miss out on a lot of things if you watch this. 

BAD QUALITY FILMING. I say buy the DVD or watch the movie in the cinema's while it's still out there.
